text: Nimuramuka muhuye na ba bandi bahakanye (ku rugamba rugamije guhesha Allah icyubahiro), mujye mubakubita ku bikanu. Nimubanesha, mujye mubagira imbohe. Hanyuma mubarekure (nta cyo batanze), cyangwa batange incungu kugeza intambara irangiye. Ni uko bimeze. Nâ€™iyo Allah aza kubishaka, yari kubatsinda (nta ruhare mubigizemo); ariko ibyo yabikoze kugira ngo agerageze bamwe muri mwe akoresheje abandi. Naho ba bandi bishwe mu nzira ya Allah, ntazigera aburizamo ibikorwa byabo
